name: VIDEO_SOURCE_AUDIO_SUBSCRIBE_STATE_CHANGED
description: Occurs when the audio subscribing state changes.The callback for the second instance.

parameters.uid: The ID of the remote user.

parameters.oldState: The previous subscribing status, see STREAM_SUBSCRIBE_STATE for details.

parameters.newState: The current subscribing status, see STREAM_SUBSCRIBE_STATE for details.

parameters.elapseSinceLastState: The time elapsed (ms) from the previous state to the current state.
